members.label: Members

minDuration.alertInfo: Ensure members have enough time to vote. It's recommended to set this to at least 1 day.
minDuration.helpText: The shortest time a proposal is open for voting. Proposals can have a longer duration but not shorter.
minDuration.label: Minimum duration

minParticipation.helpText: The percentage of tokens that participate in a proposal, out of the total supply, must be greater than or equal to this value.
minParticipation.label: Minimum participation

minVotingPower.helpText: Only members with at least this much voting power or token balance can create proposals.
minVotingPower.label: Minimum requirement

alert.majority: Proposal will be approved by majority
alert.minority: Proposals could be approved by a minority rather than a majority.

supportThreshold.helpText: The percentage of tokens that vote 'Yes' in support of a proposal, out of all tokens that have voted, must be greater than this value.
supportThreshold.label: Support threshold

voteChange.helpText: Allows voters to change their vote during the voting period. This prevents the body from giving early approval or veto.
voteChange.label: Vote change

distribute.helpText: These addresses will receive newly minted tokens.
distribute.label: Token recipients

name.helpText: This is the full name of the token. For example: Uniswap
name.label: Token name

symbol.helpText: This is the abbreviated ticker of the token. For example: UNI
symbol.label: Token symbol

notErc20Compatible.description1: The address isn’t a valid ERC-20 address and therefore can't be used in governance.

notGovernanceCompatible.description1: This token must be wrapped by its holders to be used in governance.
notGovernanceCompatible.description2: Token holders will be able to wrap their tokens at any time to receive equivalent governance tokens, which can be used to vote on proposals. They can unwrap at any time to receive their original tokens.

importToken.helpText: The address must be an ERC-20 token contract deployed on the same chain as your DAO.
importToken.label: Token address

type.helpText: You can either create a new ERC-20 token to be used in governance or import an existing one.
type.label: ERC-20 token

options.label: Do you want to {{label}} this proposal?

tokenWrapForm.footerInfo: Wrapping tokens will transfer them out of your wallet to the wrapping contract, where they can be withdrawn back to your wallet at any time.

unwrap.description: To unwrap your tokens, confirm the two onchain transactions in your wallet.
unwrap.title: Unwrap tokens

wrap.description: To wrap your tokens, confirm the two onchain transactions in your wallet.
wrap.title: Wrap tokens

a11y.description: Dialog for withdrawing tokens with dynamic fee calculation

withdrawDialog.helpText: Withdrawing early comes with a fee that decreases over time. The chart above shows how your waiting time affects how much you’ll receive when you withdraw.
withdrawDialog.title: Withdraw {{symbol}}

a11y.description: Transaction dialog for confirming token withdrawal

withdrawTransactionDialog.description: To withdraw your {{symbol}}, confirm the onchain transactions in your wallet.
withdrawTransactionDialog.title: Withdraw {{symbol}}

emptyState.description: This process doesn't have permission to execute actions on behalf of the DAO. Proposals can only be used for signaling.
emptyState.heading: Restricted execution

unrestricted.description: This process has permission to execute on behalf of the DAO. It could, for example, withdraw funds, modify governance contracts, and call any function on any smart contract.
unrestricted.heading: Unrestricted execution

uninstall.info: Proposals of this type can't be executed once this process is uninstalled.

notFound.description: We couldn't find the process you're looking for.
notFound.title: Process not found

a11y.description: Create a governance process to uninstall a plugin

feedback.description: To uninstall a process, you must first create at least one governance process that can execute any actions on behalf of the DAO.
feedback.title: No valid governance process found

prepareDaoContractsUpdateDialog.description: To publish the contract upgrades, confirm the two onchain transactions in your wallet.
prepareDaoContractsUpdateDialog.title: Publish contract upgrades

preparePluginUninstallationDialog.description: To uninstall your governance process, confirm the two onchain transactions in your wallet.

publishUninstallProposal.description: To uninstall your governance process, confirm the two onchain transactions in your wallet.
publishUninstallProposal.title: Publish process uninstallation

preparePluginUninstallationDialog.title: Uninstall process

publishDaoContractsUpdateDialog.description: To publish the contract upgrades, confirm the two onchain transactions in your wallet.
publishDaoContractsUpdateDialog.title: Publish contract upgrades

description.1: You have to create and pass a proposal in another governance process to uninstall this process.
description.2: Once uninstalled, this process will no longer be able to govern the DAO. This should only be done only when you are certain it is not needed and have the other processes needed by the DAO.

updateDaoContracts.description: There are updates available for Aragon OSx and its plugin contracts.

updateDaoContractsListDialog.description: New versions of the following contracts have been released by the Aragon team. To perform an upgrade, you will have to create a proposal and execute it.
updateDaoContractsListDialog.title: Review contracts to upgrade

error.file-invalid-type: The selected file type is not supported. Upload a valid image file (e.g., PNG, JPG, or GIF).
error.file-too-large: The file size exceeds the maximum allowed limit of 1 MB.
error.square-only: The image must be square. Upload a square image.
error.too-many-files: Only one file can be uploaded at a time.
error.wrong-dimension: The image dimensions exceed the maximum allowed size of 1024x1024 pixels.

avatarInput.helpText: JPG, PNG, or GIF of no more than 1 MB and less than 1024x1024px.
avatarInput.label: Logo

confirmWizardExit.message: If you leave this process, you'll lose all the information you've entered so far.

errorFeedback.description: If you'd like to help, you can report the issue to our team.
errorFeedback.title: Something went wrong

invalid.description: Some values are invalid. Review and fix them to proceed.
invalid.title: Invalid data

invalid-required.description: Some inputs are missing or invalid. Fix them to proceed.
invalid-required.title: Missing and invalid data

required.description: Some inputs are missing. Fill out all mandatory fields to proceed.
required.title: Missing data
